alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 01 at 2:34PM CDT until May 02 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Wet snow. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches, especially near the Upper Michigan border. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Vilas County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes. The combination of strong winds and heavy snow could lead to downed tree limbs and isolated power outages.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
